deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 31 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: Fresh Wave Gels get rid of everyday odors and replace them with clean, fresh air. Refills make it easy to refresh whenever you need it.
Use the refill to top off your Gel Jars. Our 63 oz Gel will refill the small Gel (7 oz) up to 9 times and the large Gel (15 oz) up to 4 times.
Our Gels have earned a Safer Choice Certification from the EPA because we never use parabens, sulfates, phthalates, perfumes, or harsh chemicals in our products.
Our Gel Refill is made with powerful plant oils, like clove and pine, that fight tough odors and leave your space smelling natural and fresh.
Refill your Gel Jars and place wherever odors are strongest, like basements, bathrooms, garages, and more.
We’ve got a new look! Inside it’s still the same Fresh Wave you know and love. Product packaging may vary as we transition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for years
reviews.reviewText: Fresh Wave Odor Removing gel has been something I keep on hand all the time. It works. It has removed so many different kinds of smells in my house. I was sold when a mildew order started in our basement. After a few days - it was gone!. I always have a small container in the kitchen to help with cooking odors. Plus the bath room too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best product for pet odors
reviews.reviewText: This was my mom’s go-to for getting the “dog smell” out of rooms that my childhood dog spent the most time in. I now use it for the room with my cat’s litter box. The second I start smelling litter box in my apartment, I know it’s out. I don’t know how, but it works like magic. I haven’t tried the pet specific formula, but this one works so well that I probably never will switch. Could not recommend more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The scent of this product is not overwhelming. I have a fragrance sensitivity and this product is great and cleans the air from stale odors. I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fresh Wave is the real deal
reviews.reviewText: Fresh Wave is awesome controlling odors! I have the original as I’m not a fan of scented fragrances that are often overwhelming. Mine sit in the kitchen and bath just doing their job without knowing they are there and freshening the air! Love that I can purchase a larger size of refillable to have on hand when my smaller containers need replacing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purchased 6/2019 - shipped fine, smells great
reviews.reviewText: I read a lot of other reviews for this product and the biggest complaints were that it came shipped poorly and that it didn't "work that well."Mine came wrapped in bubble wrapped and intact aside from a teeny tiny dent on the corner of the jar. No big deal.As for how this product actually works, I love this stuff. I had been buying the little jars of off-brand stuff and thinking they were just fine and this product is way, way better. Some people said stuff like "I put it on a stinky rug and it worked ok but as soon as I took the air freshener out it still stunk like rug!" Well, this will freshen the air and pull nasty stank out of a room, but it won't clean your carpet. Or your walls. Or your dog. Or your smoking roommate. It can't fix the source of the stank.But it works great for cooking odors or in a litterbox/dog bed room or in a musty closet that rarely gets used. It's an air freshener, not a cleaning service.Having a big jar is nice cause I can reuse the little jars I already bought and don't have to continually spend 5-15$ on new jars and throw all that extra plastic in the garbage (since it isn't recyclable in my area.)Some people also complained that it smelled too strongly. It is pretty strong fresh out of the jar but either due to your nose going blind to the smell or the product working that way as designed, after a couple hours you hardly notice it. It is a little strong but not chemical-y (some folks said it smelled like strong chemicals or Pine-Sol - I disagree but can't place what the scent actually is.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great natural room freshener!!
reviews.reviewText: I have these placed throughout our home and it always smells fresh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t live without FRESH WAVE!!!
reviews.reviewText: Best at neutralizing odors in every room in your house. Used to purchase in bed Bath and beyond, before they closed. Leaves of fresh odor in every room. Purchase the large size and fills at least four containers. I can tell when the containers are getting low. This product is great at neutralizing mold & mildew odor, as keeping general every day common household neutralized. I find this to be better than the ordinary floral, candle or springtime scents. The cost to long lasting performance is comparable to all of the others brand found in the grocery stores. Fresh Wave leaves a a wave of freshness for at least three to four months. This is a versatile, quality product that I highly recommend!!! Thanks FRESH WAVE!!💦

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great odor remover w/o strong floral scent
reviews.reviewText: Removes odors well. I have bad allergies and it does not affect them. Very natural smell.

I’ve used this product for years. I put some in a mason jar and open it while cooking spicy ethnic food and boom! All odor is fully absorbed. No longer smell on furniture whatsoever. In the car of smokers, boom. Smell gone. In the cabinet where spices or garbage reside, No odor. Love that it just absorbs the odor with no toxic chemicals and just dissipates over time. I can’t imagine being without it!
just bought for a refill should be good when I have to refill.

I bought this because I am hypersensitive to cat litter odour. Not just the cats, but the litter itself. This product has a strong scent when you open the jar (doesn’t bother me because i like essential oils), but it dissipates quickly when put into an open container. In one day I notice a difference. I cannot smell the litterbox anymore (it is cleaned every day!). There is no scent at all, just fresh and clean. I cannot stand perfume smells. This is so good, I put it in my Son’s bathroom because he tends to keep the door only slightly ajar, and I can smell the moisture buildup. I will definitely buy this product again. I ordered, and receivedit, the same day.

Got this for our smelly teenager son’s room. No seriously that bad! And it did take a few days... but the smell of a men’s sweaty disgusting locker room has now toned down to maybe smell more like a regular boys room. So I’m pretty happy with it. The only thing I don’t get is... I put the gel beads into small containers and the beads turn a gross brown so maybe don’t put them in a glass jar like me...
